name: Dogestory, a tale about Home
description:
You are a Dog and today you're on a very important mission.

Dogestory is a short interactive tale written in Twine.

Recommended: audio on, warm tea, autumn rain, melancholy.

If the game doesn't seem to run (or doesn't
have audio), please try a different browser.

The soundtrack is Never Dying by Scott Buckley.
With coding help from Mark Preston.
